alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:50PM EDT until July 05 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cook County in northeastern Illinois... Northwestern Lake County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Merrionette Park, or over Blue Island, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chicago, Hammond, Gary, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Calumet City, Chicago Lawn, Englewood, South Shore, Roseland, Bridgeport, East Chicago, Burbank, Lansing, Oak Forest, Harvey, Blue Island, Munster and Dolton. This includes... Purdue University Northwest Hammond, University of Chicago, Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, South Suburban College, and Museum of Science and Industry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
